column2:
Do you know?
That news incident...
I'm really worried, you know.

炎に包まれながら落下したそうなのです
column2: Lord Arisen! It seems that something enormous fell while engulfed in flames, some time ago.

たしか、南の村――テルの方でしたわ
巨大な流れ星が地面に落ちるのを
見た者もいるとか
column2:
I'm certain it happened in the southern village, Tel!
Some say they witnessed a massive shooting star falling to the ground!

old:

こっそり教えてくださらない？
私、口は堅いですわよ
column2:
If you are going to conduct an investigation, could you please quietly let me know?
I assure you, I can keep a secret.

old:

きっと、私よりも覚者さまの方が
お詳しいでしょうね
column2:
About the Vortex of Stagnation--
I'm sure you know more about it than I do.

呼び戻した方がよろしいのかしら
column2: I wonder how things are going at the fort. Actually, my younger brother works there. I wonder if it would be better to call him back.

old:
覚者の方々も、騎士団の方々も
顔色を変えて出てゆかれましたわ
ええ、私にも事の大きさはわかりますとも
column2:
Both the Arisen and the knights had their faces turn pale and left.
Yes, I understand the gravity of the situation as well.

old:

column2:
Even Lestania is in this mess.
The chaos in the small villages is immeasurable!
